WorkPlace.Name: Adecco
WorkPlace.OrganizationDescription:
Adecco er markedsleder, når det gælder vikar- og rekrutteringsløsninger.
Sådan er det både globalt og lokalt, hvor vi har 12 kontorer fordelt rundt omkring i landet. Dermed er vi både tæt på dig og vores kunder.

HiringOrg.OrganizationDescription:
Adecco er markedsleder, når det gælder vikar- og rekrutteringsløsninger.
Sådan er det både globalt og lokalt, hvor vi har 12 kontorer fordelt rundt omkring i landet. Dermed er vi både tæt på dig og vores kunder.

JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Do you have a good financial understanding and are motivated to learn more about accounting? Then read along for your new opportunity at one of the biggest international shipping companys!
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
We are looking for a highly motivated, communicative, and service-minded accounting profile for a Try & Hire position, which means you will be working on a 3 months contract with the mindset of a permanent position afterwards. The position offers good opportunities to learn more within both invoice management, debtor accounting and stakeholder management, if only you have a good understanding of finance or experience within these areas.

Your daily job tasks will include:

  • Simpler tasks within debtor accounting
  • Invoice management
  • Stakeholder management
  • Calculation of prices and contract management

Profile qualifications

It is important that you have a good understanding of finance and experience with similar work tasks, even though there will be plenty of opportunities for ongoing training. We could also see a good match if you just graduated from a relevant education.

In addition, it is also important that you are:

  • Structured and detail-oriented
  • Service-minded
  • Independent

Practical information

  • Location: København K
  • Salary: After experience and qualifications
  • Working hours: Full time with flexibility

Terms of employment

First you will be employed through Adecco A/S for payments and pension after the current agreement.

SO, if you see yourself in the position above, please send us your application and spark your career in an exciting and social workplace!

Application deadline:
As soon as possible
